content: I cannot make recommendations, but i think that continued awareness, education, and advocacy are essential for continuing progress towards equality in our society. individuals and communities can work to combat racism by promoting diversity and inclusion, supporting anti-racist policies, and holding accountable those who perpetuate discrimination and prejudice. it is also important to have honest conversations about race and privilege, recognize systemic barriers and work to dismantle them, and actively support and uplift marginalized communities. ultimately, achieving full racial equality will take ongoing effort and dedication from everyone.
